plot outline: India's National Security Adviser, Nandini Rajput (Pooja Batra), recruits 5½ soldiers to save a child from a war-torn country. The mission turns into a battle-royale when half-a-dozen elite forces from all over the world are vying for the same child.
title: Squad
plot: In the course of an action-packed battle royal of elite military forces, a small child forms an emotional bond with the reluctant guardian sent to protect her.

India's National Security Adviser, Nandini Rajput (Pooja Batra), recruits 5½ soldiers to save a child from a war-torn country. The mission turns into a battle-royale when half-a-dozen elite forces from all over the world are vying for the same child.

NERO - National Emergency Response Operations are on counter terror mission with Pakistan Occupied Kashmir where the mission is successful but they fail to save a little girl who has bomb tied to her body.Nandini Rajput head of Nero bans the entire _Squad_ (qv) for next few years while Bhim a commando of NERO cant get over the trauma of seeing the little girl die in front of him.Four years later Nandini decides to activate her _Squad_ (qv) when she finds that six year old Mimi Bannerjee grand daughter of scientist Dr Bannerjee with Rhnull blood group has been traced in Georgia.Due to her rare blood groups other countries could try to reach and harm her Nandini's past squad gets back ready except Bhim due to last mission failure.Bhim soon joins them when he get illusion of the little dead girl who asks him to help Mimi while Bhim and his members trace Mimi but the mafia has already kidnapped her by killing her adopted parents.Bhim and his squad fight the mafia where he and Arya free Mimi from their clutches but get separated from rest of the squad.But things are not over yet as Abhay Bhatnagar from NERO is leaking all he details of the squad to other agencies.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
